titleStmt.title: Titus and Berenice, a tragedy acted at the Duke's Theatre : with a farce called The cheats of Scapin / by Tho. Otway.
titleStmt.author: Otway, Thomas, 1652-1685.
Racine, Jean, 1639-1699. Bérénice.
Molière, 1622-1673. Fourberies de Scapin.

notesStmt.note: Translated and adapted from Racine's "Bérénice" and the farce from Molière's "Les fourberies de Scapin".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
